sect1.title: register_block
sect1.para: Use this to dynamically register block functions plugins. Pass in the block function name, followed by the PHP function name that implements it.

example.title: register_block
example.programlisting:
<?php

/* PHP */
$smarty->register_block("translate", "do_translation");

function do_translation ($params, $content, &$smarty) {
    if ($content) {
        $lang = $params['lang'];

}
?>
